  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(Board board, App app, Player player1, Player player2, Message textBox)
      Constructor for creating new game.
      Parameters:
      board - is a board we run our game on.
      app - is the application we run our game on.
      player1 - is the first player.
      player2 - is the second player.
      textBox - is the message box that displays messages.

  • Method Details

    • updateGameStatus

      public void updateGameStatus(int status)
      Display appropriate message and timer based on the state of the game.
      Parameters:
      status - is the status from the board. 0 is normal, 1 is being checked, 2 is playing legal move while in check, 3 is checkmate, 4 is timer over, 5 is resign, 6 is draw.

    • isOver

      public boolean isOver()

    • resign

      public void resign()
      Updates the game state after player resign.

    • processMoveState

      public void processMoveState(int moveState)
      Update the game state base on the move information from the previous move.
      Parameters:
      moveState - is the status of the previous legal move, 2 is success, 3 is failure since the previous legal move did not protect the kings

    • mouseClicked

      public void mouseClicked(int x, int y)
      Process the mouse click event from user.
      Parameters:
      x - is the x coordinate of the click.
      y - is the y coordinate of the click.

    • switchTurn

      public void switchTurn()
      Switch turn of the player.

    • tick

      public void tick(processing.core.PApplet app)
      Update game state and draw components.
      Parameters:
      app - the main application.
